Nightlight:

"No he was worried..." replied Nightlight "He was worried  'ca=
use no one knew where Zeni was... He's a nice bot and..."

"Hello" said hap=
pily a child like voice around "You're new, aren't you??? Where's Zeni? I l=
ike play with him... "

Trinity jumped to Nightlight's arms, and Nightlight=
 said "She's Trinity. Trinity, he's Arrow..."

"Hello..." said the child wi=
th a big smile "Nice to meet you..."
